projects.title: One Za'abeel Tower & Link Bridge
projects.shortDescription: Iconic mixed-use development featuring 'The Link' - world's longest cantilever structure connecting two towers in Dubai.
projects.altText: One Za'abeel Tower with the Link Bridge cantilever structure in Dubai

images.caption: The Link Bridge - World's Longest Cantilever

projects.description: One Za'abeel represents one of the most challenging structural steel projects in the Middle East. As Senior Tekla Designer at Al Abbar Aluminium, I was responsible for detailed steel modeling of the iconic 'Link' cantilever structure spanning 226 meters between two towers. The project required complex connection designs for cantilever support systems and coordination with architectural facade elements. My role included preparing MTOs, cutting lists, setting out plans, and CNC files while coordinating with structural engineers to ensure precise load distribution calculations for this architectural marvel.

projects.title: Sydney Gateway Stage 1
projects.shortDescription: Major infrastructure project connecting Sydney Airport to motorway network with complex steel bridge structures.
projects.altText: Sydney Gateway bridge construction with steel structures during daylight
projects.description: As Structural Steel Detailer at Macfab Engineering, I prepared accurate fabrication drawings for the Sydney Gateway Stage 1 project using Tekla Structures 2023. This critical infrastructure development connects Sydney Airport to the broader motorway network. My responsibilities included creating detailed shop drawings for main girders, cross-beams, and support systems, ensuring strict adherence to Australian standards (AS4100). I coordinated extensively with civil engineering teams to deliver comprehensive erection sequences and material specifications that ensured seamless fabrication and installation across all project phases.

projects.title: ICD-Brookfield Place DIFC
projects.shortDescription: Premium office development in Dubai International Financial Centre with intricate steel framework systems.
projects.altText: ICD-Brookfield Place commercial office building exterior in Dubai Financial Center
projects.description: At Al Abbar Aluminium, I served as Senior Tekla Designer for the ICD-Brookfield Place project, a premium office development within Dubai International Financial Centre. The project featured intricate steel framework systems supporting modern facade designs. My detailing services covered primary structural steel members, secondary framing elements, and specialized facade support systems. The project required extensive BIM coordination (Level 2) to ensure seamless integration with MEP systems and architectural elements. I prepared MTOs, cutting lists, and CNC files while coordinating RFIs with structural engineers to deliver precision-engineered solutions meeting international standards.

projects.title: Concourse B Platform Steelworks - DXB
projects.shortDescription: Airport infrastructure project at Dubai International Airport with precision steel detailing for platform canopies.
projects.altText: Concourse B Platform steel structure at Dubai International Airport terminal
projects.description: As Senior Structural Detailing Engineer at Ginco Steel, I was responsible for precision steel detailing for platform canopies and support structures at Dubai International Airport's Concourse B. This large-scale airport infrastructure project presented unique challenges including strict aviation safety requirements and minimal disruption to ongoing airport operations. I delivered detailed shop drawings for canopy structures, column supports, and complex connection details that ensured structural integrity while maintaining the architectural vision of creating a light, airy passenger experience. My role included coordination with multiple stakeholders and ensuring compliance with aviation regulations.

projects.title: Qatalum Anode Service Plant
projects.shortDescription: Industrial plant steel structures for Qatar's aluminum production facility with material handling systems.
projects.altText: Industrial plant steel structures at Qatalum project
projects.description: During my tenure at Mabani Steel, I worked as Structural Detailing Engineer on the Qatalum Anode Service Plant project in Qatar. This industrial facility required detailed steel structures for aluminum production processes including material handling systems. I prepared comprehensive shop drawings for structural frames, bracing systems, and conveyor supports. The project demanded precise coordination with Australian engineering standards and involved creating erection plans and anchor bolt setting plans. My responsibilities included modeling complex industrial structures and generating detailed fabrication drawings for international standards compliance.

projects.title: Butene/BTX Plant Yanbu
projects.shortDescription: Petrochemical plant steel structures for Yanbu National Petrochemical Company with complex piping supports.
projects.altText: Petrochemical plant steel structures at Yanbu
projects.description: At Zamil Structural Steel, I worked as Structural Detailer on the Butene/BTX Plant project for Yanbu National Petrochemical Company. This petrochemical facility required detailed steel structures capable of supporting complex piping systems under high-temperature conditions. I prepared shop drawings for structural frames, platform supports, and specialized pipe racks. The project involved working with international standards (API, ASME) and coordinating with Hyundai Engineering & Construction. My role included creating detailed models of industrial structures and generating comprehensive fabrication packages for one of Saudi Arabia's leading petrochemical facilities.

projects.title: Prospect Highway Upgrade
projects.shortDescription: Highway upgrade project in Blacktown NSW with steel bridge components and retaining structures.
projects.altText: Highway bridge construction in Blacktown NSW
projects.description: As part of my role at Macfab Engineering, I worked on the Prospect Highway Upgrade project for Fulton Hogan. This infrastructure project involved steel detailing for bridge components and retaining structures along a 4.5km highway section in Blacktown, NSW. I prepared fabrication drawings for steel girders, cross-beams, and support systems, ensuring compliance with AS5100 Bridge Design Code. The project required precise material estimation and coordination with civil contractors to ensure timely delivery of steel components for this critical transport infrastructure upgrade.

projects.title: No.6 Blast Furnace Reline
projects.shortDescription: Blast furnace access platforms and support structures for steel plant maintenance operations.
projects.altText: Blast furnace access platforms and structures
projects.description: As a freelance Steel Detailer, I worked on the No.6 Blast Furnace Reline project for Soto Consulting Engineers. This project involved designing and detailing access platforms and support structures for blast furnace maintenance operations. The structures needed to withstand high-heat conditions while providing safe access for maintenance crews. I created detailed models of multi-level platforms, stair systems, and safety structures, ensuring compliance with industrial safety standards. The project required innovative solutions for thermal expansion and corrosion resistance in harsh industrial environments.

projects.title: 12 Corunna Ave Commercial Building
projects.shortDescription: Commercial building steel framework in Auckland with modern architectural requirements.
projects.altText: Commercial building steel framework in Auckland
projects.description: Working freelance for Steelcraft Engineering, I provided steel detailing services for the 12 Corunna Ave commercial building in Auckland. This mixed-use development required a sophisticated steel framework with architectural exposed steel elements. I created detailed models of the structural steel system, including columns, beams, and bracing, while coordinating with architectural requirements for exposed steel features. The project followed New Zealand standards (NZS 3404) and required innovative detailing solutions for seismic considerations specific to the Auckland region.

projects.title: Multiple Dwelling Residential
projects.shortDescription: Residential apartment complex steel structure in Cheltenham with multi-level construction.
projects.description: For the ACE Group, I detailed steel structures for a multiple dwelling residential project in Cheltenham, Australia. This 4-story apartment complex required light steel framing systems for efficient construction. I prepared detailed shop drawings for residential steel frames, floor systems, and balcony structures. The project emphasized cost-effective solutions while maintaining structural integrity and meeting residential building codes. My work included coordinating with residential architects to ensure steel elements integrated seamlessly with other building systems while optimizing material usage.
